column5: Our place is close to Temple, TX, 50 miles from Austin, 40 miles from Killeen and 30 miles from Waco. Youâ€™ll love our place, named Whispering Ponds, because of the location. It is a beautiful spacious four bedroom, three bath home on 53 quiet acres with two ponds. You will see deer, ducks, doves and turtles. It is perfect for family gatherings and retreats. Our home includes a large kitchen with a lot of extras, ie. double ovens and ice machine.
